thread.title: BRIEF-Libbey Inc. Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.32

title: BRIEF-Libbey Inc. Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.32
text: February 27, 2018 / 12:54 PM / Updated 21 minutes ago BRIEF-Libbey Inc. Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.32 Reuters Staff Feb 27 (Reuters) - Libbey Inc: * ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 SALES ROSE 8.8 PERCENT TO $224 MILLION * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.32 * SEES 2018 NET SALES INCREASE IN LOW SINGLE DIGITS * SEES 2018 CAPEX IN RANGE OF $50 MILLION TO $55 MILLION * ‍EXPECTS FOR FULL-YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA MARGINS OF 10 PERCENT TO 11 PERCENT​ * ‍FOR FIRST HALF OF 2018 PROJECTS ADJUSTED EBITDA MARGINS OF 8.5 PERCENT TO 9.5 PERCENT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
